entry.title: Combined summary - BIP-notatether-signedmessage (appendix)
entry.summary: Ali has raised concerns about a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) that is not a standard. This lack of official status could lead to the N+1 problem, which is a concern in the Bitcoin community. The instructions for this particular BIP are limited to a reference manual, which could have been hosted on any website. Ali believes that these instructions should be made official to avoid potential issues.
